reviewText: There are overlapping sound tracks that make the film painful and confusing to watch. I wish had read the other comments. I probably would still have rented but it is so distracting that I am only able to catch 1/3 to 1/4 of the information.

Impossible to watch as the editor's voice was in the background speaking  while the film was running. It might have been interesting but I couldn't watch it because it was too distracting listening to the commentator while the film was running.
Good footage, but something is off with the audio. There are two simultaneous talk tracks going on throughout the movie. It is difficult to follow.
Possibly the only film of its kind. This film is vital to anyone wanting to understand the culture of American Rom.

It was great it
It helped to understand more of a culture
That no one really knows about and it better then the tv show that are not true
